rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;a94d4a8a.1407">   <title>Re: Jisc CAG </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;a94d4a8a.1407</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>I would like to add my thanks to Margaret's for the contribution you have all made to our thinking in the Digital Content area. It was a great pleasure to work with such a supportive, engaged and expert group!<br><br>I am now managing a new portfolio of activities in the e-research area and I hope I will be crossing paths with many of you as we move forward. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-23T09:20:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Catherine Grout</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;a94d4a8a.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;afbb96e9.1407">   <title>Re: Jisc CAG </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;afbb96e9.1407</link>   <description> Dear Margaret<br><br>Thank you for this update.<br><br>I am glad that CAG proved to be a useful group, but agree completely with the decision to rethink things for the future as agility is certainly the name of the game now. If I can be of help in anyway, please do let me know. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-21T11:19:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Pat Christie</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;afbb96e9.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;b1f12289.1407">   <title>Re: Jisc CAG </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;b1f12289.1407</link>   <description> Hi Margaret,<br><br>Thanks for the email. Certainly agree with the strategy that is now being followed, but would want to support your view that CAG served a very useful purpose during its existence. Looking forward to what comes next...<br><br>With Best Wishes<br><br>Chris<br><br>Chris Batt OBE<br>PhD Researcher, University College London<br><br>| 07525 492944 | cbatt@mac.com | www.digital-futures.org | [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-21T10:32:45+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Chris Batt</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;b1f12289.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;e430c72b.1407">   <title>Re: Jisc CAG </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;e430c72b.1407</link>   <description> Thank you Margaret for this information and for your kind and wise words.<br><br>It has been a pleasure to work with you and to be part of the Jisc CAG. Your leadership in the Chair made this a very purposeful and productive group to be part of. Thank you for all you have done to help this group and the wider community through your service as Chair. Catherine, Paola and Alastair have all been superb to work with throughout. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-21T09:12:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tanner, Simon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;e430c72b.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;62c66796.1407">   <title>Jisc CAG </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;62c66796.1407</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>I know that Paola has been in touch with all of you over the last few weeks, to take you through our thinking about the future of Jisc's Content Advisory Group. As you will have gathered, Paola and I felt that, following the Jisc's reorganisation of their work on content and the associated staff teams, the CAG was probably no longer the most effective way of drawing in advice and feedback to ensure that the team gets sound guidance from the sector. And you all agreed! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-21T09:58:28+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Margaret Coutts</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=JISC-CONTENT-ADVISORY-GROUP;62c66796.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
